title: How do I set a screen unlock PIN?
answer: [Choose Settings > Security > Unlock Type >Digital Code]() Under Input your PIN, enter a PIN. Enter the PIN again and touch OK. When you power on the phone or press the power button to turn on the screen, the unlock screen is displayed. You can then enter the PIN, then touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111735)to unlock the screen.
